data.name: ContainsCharactersNegatedDefaultMessageTemplate
data.value: The value must not contain the characters in "{3}" with mode "{4}".

data.name: ContainsCharactersNonNegatedDefaultMessageTemplate
data.value: The value must contain the characters in "{3}" with mode "{4}".

data.name: EnumConversionNegatedDefaultMessageTemplate
data.value: The value must not be defined in the "{3}" enum type.

data.name: EnumConversionNonNegatedDefaultMessageTemplate
data.value: The value must be defined in the "{3}" enum type.

data.name: ExceptionAttemptedValueAccessForInstanceOfInvalidType
data.value: Attempted to retrieve value from instance of wrong type.

data.name: ExceptionCannotSetResourceBasedMessageTemplatesIfTemplateIsSet
data.value: A message template has been set already, resource based message templates are not allowed.

data.name: ExceptionCannotSetResourceMessageTemplatesIfResourceTemplateIsSet
data.value: A message template resource has been set already; template override is not allowed.

data.name: ExceptionInvalidDate
data.value: The supplied string is not a valid date representation.

data.name: ExceptionInvalidTargetType
data.value: Value to validate is not of the expected type: expected {0} but got {1} instead.

data.name: ExceptionLowerBoundNull
data.value: The lower bound cannot be null unless it's type is Ingore.

data.name: ExceptionMethodHasNoReturnValue
data.value: Method to access value does not have a return value.

data.name: ExceptionMethodHasParameters
data.value: Method to access value has parameters.

data.name: ExceptionObjectCollectionValidatorDataTargetTypeNotSet
data.value: The target element type has not been set in the configuration.

data.name: ExceptionPartiallyDefinedResourceForMessageTemplate
data.value: Both resource name and resource type must be defined to retrieve the message template.

data.name: ExceptionPropertyNotFound
data.value: The source property to request validators from does not exist.

data.name: ExceptionPropertyNotReadable
data.value: The source property to request validators from is not readable.

data.name: ExceptionSelfValidationMethodWithInvalidSignature
data.value: The self validation method has an invalid signature. It should be "void [method name](ValidationResults)".

data.name: ExceptionTypeNotFound
data.value: The source type to request validators from has not been found.

data.name: ExceptionUpperBoundLowerThanLowerBound
data.value: Upper bound cannot be lower than lower bound.

data.name: ExceptionUpperBoundNull
data.value: The upper bound cannot be null unless it's type is Ingore.

data.name: MustImplementOperation
data.value: The operation must be implemented by a subclass.

data.value: The value must be null.

data.name: ObjectCollectionValidatorIncompatibleElementInTargetCollection
data.value: The element in the validated collection is not compatible with the expected type.

data.value: The supplied object is not a collection.

data.name: ObjectValidatorInvalidTargetType
data.value: The supplied object is not compatible with the expected type.

data.name: RangeValidatorNonNegatedDefaultMessageTemplate
data.value: The value must fall within the range "{3}" ({4}) - "{5}" ({6}).

data.name: RegexValidatorNonNegatedDefaultMessageTemplate
data.value: The value must match the regular expression "{3}" with options "{4}".

data.name: SelfValidationMethodThrownMessage
data.value: The self validation method thrown an exception while evaluating.

data.value: The reference provided to the self validation method is either null or references an instance of a non-compatible type.

data.value: The value does not belong to the domain.

data.value: The value must fall within the range "{3}" ({4}) - "{5}" ({6}) relative to now.

data.value: The value must not fall within the range "{3}" ({4}) - "{5}" ({6}) relative to now.

data.value: It's not possible to specify a None DateTime unit if a BoundaryType different from Ignore is used.

data.name: StringLengthValidatorNegatedDefaultMessageTemplate
data.value: The length of the value must not fall within the range "{3}" ({4}) - "{5}" ({6}).

data.value: The value must be convertible to type "{3}".

data.name: RangeValidatorNegatedDefaultMessageTemplate
data.value: The value must not fall within the range "{3}" ({4}) - "{5}" ({6}).

data.name: RegexValidatorNegatedDefaultMessageTemplate
data.value: The value must not match the regular expression "{3}" with options "{4}".

data.name: ErrorValueAccessInvalidType
data.value: The value for "{0}" could not be accessed from an instance of "{1}".

data.name: ErrorValueAccessNull

data.value: The supplied value could not be converted to the target property type.

data.value: The property name required to retrieve validation information for integration is not found.

data.value: The property name required to retrieve validation information for integration is invalid or does not belong to a public property.

data.value: The property name required to retrieve validation information for integration refers to nonreadable property.

data.name: ExceptionIntegrationValidatedTypeNotAvailable
data.value: The type required to retrieve validation information for integration is not found.

data.value: This method should not have been called.

data.value: Failure to retrieve comparand for key "{0}": {1}.

data.value: All validators failed for key "{1}".

data.value: The value is not null and failed all its validation rules for key "{1}".
